verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Put on the garments of praise For the spirit of heaviness Let the oil of gladness Flow down from Your throne Put on the garments of praise For the spirit of heaviness Your joy is my strength alone My strength alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May these broken weary bones Rise to dance again Wet this dry and thirsty land With a river Lord our eyes are fixed on You And we are waiting For Your garland of grace As we praise Your name.{/lang-eng}
